org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.journal
Class AeJournalEntryFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery.journal.AeJournalEntryFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeJournalEntryFactory
public class AeJournalEntryFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeJournalEntryFactory

Implements factory to construct instances of IAeJournalEntry from the entry's persisted data: entry type, location id, journal entry id, and storage document.
